languages.text: "Значит, ты плохо ее наказывал, железный мон-кай. Ничего, в плену ты поймешь, как надо мучить, чтобы тебя страшились предать".
"You must have punished it poorly, iron mon-keigh. No matter. As a captive, you will learn how to apply the art of torture to make it fear the very thought of betrayal."
languages.original_text: "Значит, ты плохо ее наказывал, железный мон-кай. Ничего, в плену ты поймешь, как надо мучить, чтобы тебя страшились предать".

traits.locale_text: "You must have punished her poorly, iron mon-keigh. This is fine, in captivity you will learn how to apply the art of torture to scour the very thought of betrayal."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

traits.locale_text: "You must have punished her poorly, iron mon-keigh. This is fine, in captivity you will learn how to apply the art of torture to scour the very thought of betrayal."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

traits.locale_text: "You must have punished it poorly, iron mon-keigh. This is fine. As a captive, you will learn how to apply the art of torture to scour the very thought of betrayal."

traits.locale_text: "You must have punished it poorly, iron mon-keigh. No matter. As a captive, you will learn how to apply the art of torture to make it fear the very thought of betrayal."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

traits.locale_text: "You must have punished it poorly, iron mon-keigh. No matter. As a captive, you will learn how to apply the art of torture to make it fear the very thought of betrayal."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: « Vous ne l'avez pas suffisamment punie, mon-keigh de métal. Mais qu'importe. Une fois captif, vous découvrirez les arcanes de la torture propres à annihiler toute velléité de trahison. »
languages.original_text: "You must have punished it poorly, iron mon-keigh. No matter. As a captive, you will learn how to apply the art of torture to make it fear the very thought of betrayal."

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne l'avez pas suffisamment punie, mon-keigh de métal. Mais n'ayez crainte. Une fois captif, vous découvrirez les arcanes de la torture propres à éliminer toute velléité de trahison. »
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: “肯定是因为你惩罚它还惩罚得不够狠，铁猴子。不过不要紧，你现在成为了俘虏。很快，你就可以好好学习一下，如何运用酷刑的艺术消灭背叛的念头。”
languages.original_text: "You must have punished it poorly, iron mon-keigh. No matter. As a captive, you will learn how to apply the art of torture to make it fear the very thought of betrayal."

traits.locale_text: “肯定是因为你惩罚它还惩罚得不够狠，铁猴子。不过不要紧，你现在成为了俘虏。很快，你就可以好好学习如何运用酷刑的艺术消灭背叛的念头。”
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: 「罰の与え方が悪かったのだろうな、鉄のモン＝ケイよ。まぁ、いい。囚われの身となったお前は、裏切りを恐れさせるために、拷問術を応用することを学ぶのだ」
languages.original_text: "You must have punished it poorly, iron mon-keigh. No matter. As a captive, you will learn how to apply the art of torture to make it fear the very thought of betrayal."

traits.locale_text: 「罰の与え方が悪かったのだろうな、鉄のモン＝ケイよ。まぁ、いい。囚われの身となったお前は、裏切りを恐れさせるために、拷問術を応用することを学ぶのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: "Ihr müsst ihn schlecht gestraft haben, {mf|eiserner|eiserne} Chem-Pan-Sey. Gleichgültig. Als {mf|Gefangener|Gefangene} werdet Ihr noch erfahren, wie man die Kunst der Folter einsetzt, damit er selbst den bloßen Gedanke an Verrat fürchtet."
languages.original_text: "You must have punished it poorly, iron mon-keigh. No matter. As a captive, you will learn how to apply the art of torture to make it fear the very thought of betrayal."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst ihn schlecht gestraft haben, {mf|eiserner|eiserne} Chem-Pan-Sey. Das ist aber in Ordnung. Als {mf|Gefangener|Gefangene} werdet Ihr noch erfahren, wie man die Kunst der Folter anwendet, um jegliche Gedanken an Verrat auszumerzen."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: «Será porque no la has castigado apropiadamente, mon-keigh de hierro. No importa. Como mi cautivo, aprenderás a aplicar el arte de la tortura para llenar tu mente de terror ante el concepto mismo de la traición».
languages.original_text: "You must have punished it poorly, iron mon-keigh. No matter. As a captive, you will learn how to apply the art of torture to make it fear the very thought of betrayal."

traits.locale_text: «Será porque no la has castigado apropiadamente, mon-keigh de hierro. Pero no pasa nada. Como mi cautivo, aprenderás a aplicar el arte de la tortura para suprimir de tu mente el concepto mismo de la traición».
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: "Vücuduna yeterince eziyet etmediğin içindir demir mon-keigh. Önemi yok. Tutsağımız olarak eziyet sanatının nasıl icra edildiğini öğreneceksin, böylece vücudunun sana ihanet etme düşüncesinden bile korkmasını sağlayabilirsin."
languages.original_text: "You must have punished it poorly, iron mon-keigh. No matter. As a captive, you will learn how to apply the art of torture to make it fear the very thought of betrayal."

traits.locale_text: "Vücuduna yeterince eziyet etmediğin içindir demir mon-keigh. Önemi yok. Tutsağımız olarak eziyet sanatının nasıl kullanıldığını öğreneceksin. Böylece vücudunun sana ihanet etme düşüncesinden bile korkmasını sağlayabilirsin."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai
